author: Matt Bassil
description:
If you’re on the hunt for Scarlet & Violet Pokémon cards and have been coming up short, this Amazon deal is for you. This link has a bundle of three Pokeball-shaped tins with a bunch of packs and sticker sheet accessories.

title: Get nine Scarlet & Violet Pokémon packs with this Amazon deal

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The online indie marketplace Itch.io has a charity bundle on sale full of tabletop RPGs that will kit you out with great alternatives to Dungeons and Dragons. The proceeds are being sent to Ukraine, to support hospitals damaged in the war with Russia.

Continue reading Get 187 indie DnD alternatives for $8 and raise money for Ukraine
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Get 187 indie DnD alternatives for $8 and raise money for Ukraine

author: Alex Evans
description:
If you've spent any time enjoying Warhammer 40k battle report videos on YouTube during the last 18 years, you know what MiniWarGaming is. The Ontario, Canada based channel is the Alpha and Omega of online Warhammer videos - it was there at the beginning in 2007, and it's still cranking out brilliant entertainment now. With competition hotter than ever, however, MWG is making some big changes this week - so we've invited head honcho Matthew Glanfield for a live AMA in Wargamer's Discord to talk over the whys, the wherefores, and what fans can look forward to!

Continue reading Win Warhammer 40k terrain, dice, and a year of videos in our MiniWarGaming AMA!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets,
title: Win Warhammer 40k terrain, dice, and a year of videos in our MiniWarGaming AMA!

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Sometimes, an army list appears on the competitive scene for a wargame that makes you sit up and take notice. A brutal Separatist Alliance force is doing the rounds of Star Wars Legion’s competitive circuit right now, and once you’ve seen it, there’s a good chance you’ll be asking: “how the heck am I supposed to deal with that?!”

Continue reading Are snail tanks and Separatist droids Star Wars Legion's best army?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion - release dates roadmap, Star Wars Shatterpoint review
title: Are snail tanks and Separatist droids Star Wars Legion's best army?

author: Matt Bassil
description:
If you're looking for spoilers for Riot Games' upcoming physical League of Legends TCG Riftbound, you've come to the right place. We had the chance to try out the cards early a couple weeks ago, and now we're back to share them with you lovely lot.

author: Callum Self
description:
It’s time for the villains to lead the charge again, with Disney Lorcana’s Reign of Jafar finally here. The newest expansion has a strong collection of cards to get your hands on, and if you’re keen to fill your binders up with more than 280 cards, you can grab this booster box of the latest set at a great discount, worthy of the grand vizier of Agrabah himself.

Continue reading Grab 24 packs of Disney Lorcana Reign of Jafar at a great price right now
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Lorcana, Best Lorcana starter decks, Most expensive Lorcana cards
title: Grab 24 packs of Disney Lorcana Reign of Jafar at a great price right now

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Keeper of the Nine Gales has soared in value on the secondary market, going from just $2 on May 20 to $9.69 on June 9 according to MTG Goldfish. That's a pretty swift ascension of 360%.

Continue reading Decades-old MTG card spikes 360% thanks to Final Fantasy's Chocobo fans
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Decades-old MTG card spikes 360% thanks to Final Fantasy's Chocobo fans

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Awaken Realms and Lookout Games are teaming up to create an updated special edition of classic worker placement game Agricola, in which the art, graphic design, and even meeples are given as much love and attention as Uwe Rosenburg’s timeless rule set. It’s a fresh lick of paint for a revered board game that will no doubt be extremely popular - but is it really Agricola if it actually looks like a game a human being could play and enjoy?

Continue reading Ugly board game Agricola has a sexy new edition - but has it lost its soul?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best board games, The best strategy board games, Board games for adults
title: Ugly board game Agricola has a sexy new edition - but has it lost its soul?
